item.title: T
item.description: score:4 Chances: AT&T’s stock price is currently at its lowest level since the mid-1990s, which may present a buying opportunity. AT&T is a leading wireless carrier in the U.S., with positive developments in its core wireless business. Automatic bill payment and discounts could positively impact customer retention and revenue for AT&T.
